docs.title: Readings
docs.text:
• Finding God underground. Suffering and redemption, the pogrom of 7 October, 2023.
  • AI is Affectation of Intelligence. A continuation of The Illusion of Artificial Intelligence, applying the concept of idolatry to AI and emphasizing that seemingly intelligent systems are ultimately human-made artifacts—machines devoid of understanding, agency, or awareness (pretend intelligence).
